_header: Right fain would I my acquaintance make

CULLl510.First Lines:
Ryt fane wald I my quentance makWith sir pennie & waitt ȝe
                    quhy…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…That pure commounis can never obteneAnd dayis lenth with him
                    to speik

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Rycht fane wald I my quentance makwithe Schir penny and wait
                    ȝe quhy…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…That pure commounis can never obteneAne dayis lenthe with him
                    to speik

Banna.First Lines:
Rycht fane wald I my quentans makWith schir penny and wat ȝe
                    quhy…
Banna.Last Lines:
…That pure commownis can nocht obteneane dey to byd with him
                    to speik
